raw_text: EVA – M.K. THERESA EVA SILVA – (Retired Lecturer,​ Training Colleges,​ Maharagama and Bolawalana,​ former Teacher,​ Good Shepherd’s Convent,​ Kotahena and Nimala Maria Balika Vidyalaya,​ Thudella),​ beloved wife of late Ruben Silva,​ mother of Sureen (Canada),​ Jayanath (Architect) and Malik (Lecturer,​ UCS – University of Colombo) and beloved sister of late Shirley,​ late Rev. Fr. Gregory,​ Terrence,​ Milroy,​ Pamella and Petley,​ beloved mother-in-law of Anoma (Canada),​ Madumali (Architect) and Tilani (Ministry of Foreign Affairs),​ beloved grandmother to Roshane,​ Ruwan,​ Savandhi,​ Rahul,​ Thurya and Nishadi went to Arms in Jesus. Remains lie at 101,​ Saint Joseph’s Road,​ Kanuwana,​ Ja-Ela. Cortege leaves at 3.30 p.m. on Wednesday,​ 19th July 2023 for burial at Kanuwana,​ Ja-Ela Roman Catholic Burial Ground. Condolences Tel. 0112231143.044472

SAMARASEKERA – MRS NELLIE – Beloved wife of late Charlie Samarasekera (Attorney-at-Law),​ beloved mother of Udithanjalie (UK),​ Dhammika (SL) and Manjula (USA),​ expired. Funeral on 20th July 2023 at Matara General Cemetery at 4.30 p.m. Cortege leaves No. 38/​1,​ Esplanade Road,​ Uyanwatta,​ Matara at 4.00 p.m.044368
